title: Ch4 Secrets of the Sauna 720p x264 AAC HDTV MVGroup.org
description:
Secrets of the Sauna

Sociopolitical Documentary hosted by Janet Dibley, published by Channel 4 in 2016 - English narration. 
http://docuwiki.net/images/e/ee/Secrets-of-the-Sauna-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------
Gay saunas are places where men meet strangers to have sex. With exclusive access to one Nottingham business, this candid one-off documentary enters the often controversial and always secretive world of the gay sauna for the very first time. The programme meets the people who go there for sexual pleasure - from teachers to plumbers to Tory councillors - and the staff who clean up after them. There is thought to be a gay sauna in almost every city in the UK. But what exactly happens inside? The sauna is run by Joe and John, who have been a couple for over 30 years. The programme offers a rarely before seen snapshot of gay culture; a world with its own rules and rituals, where only men are welcome.
